name: Chaitanya Tejaswi
summary: An Electronics & Communication (EC) graduate with a demonstrated exposure in Embedded Systems, Image Processing, and Python-based development; I am currently looking for an opportunity in similar domains. I have worked extensively with - AVR/ARM microcontrollers, implementing source codes in ASM/C; OCR & QR Codes in addition to conventional image processing; Python3 for creating GUIs & shell utilities, web applications (using Flask/Selenium), and machine learning scripts (using SciPy stack). I'm open to all software development roles.

education.Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya, Vallabh: Completed Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) in Electronics & Communication with a CGPA of 8.35.
education.OSEM High School, Morbi: Completed HSC from CBSE Board with an aggregate of 80.2%.
education.Delhi Public School, Gandhinagar: Completed SSC from CBSE Board with a CGPA of 9.8.

1.heading: A Novel Approach of Tesseract-OCR Usage for Newspaper Article Images
1.description: A novel approach for optical character recognition of newspaper article images (captured as smartphone camera images) is presented, with evaluation based on two sets of images; both captured using the same camera, under varying lighting conditions.

1.heading: Creating eBooks from Webpages using Python
1.description: A talk to get you started with web scraping in Python using minimal external dependencies. We will write a script that scrapes online court judgments and creates Android/Kindle compatible ebooks from them.

1.heading: Mod-100 Counter
1.description: Implemented a Mod-100 Counter using IC-7490 (Decade Counter) & IC-74248 (BCD to 7-segment Decoder) that loops through 00-99.

2.heading: Keypad & ADC/DAC Interfacing with 8085µp
2.description: Interfaced 4x4 keypad & ADC/DAC (0800/0808) with Intel 8085µp using 8255 PPI.

3.heading: Filter Implementation using MATLAB
3.description: Implemented lowpass and bandpass filters in MATLAB as an application of Sampling Theorem.

4.heading: GSM Communication with AVRµc
4.description: Implemented serial communication between AVRµc (ATmega32) & GSM Module (SIM300).

5.heading: QR Code-based information system using QPython3 IDE on Android devices
5.description: Wrote sample codes for automation using QR codes.

6.heading: OCR-based Personal Assistant
6.description: Implemented a text extractor & text reader module for newspaper article images using Tesseract OCR & OpenCV, implemented in Python.

7.heading: Pico-Projector based Automation
7.description: Implemented Classroom Automation (for teachers) using DLPDLCR2000EVM pico-projector module & Raspberry Pi 3B as server.
